item.description:
New Info for this event:
the band starts at 9pm, and there is a cover charge of $3 after 9pm

This is a new venue for us to meet and dance to Four on the Floor. Website states:
Backstage Grille is located on Route 38 in Tewksbury. Good food, good fun. We have free pool and Karaoke on Wednesdays. Free pool and open mike on Thursdays. Live cover bands on Fridays and Saturdays. We also offer a full menu along with daily specials. (Best Steak Tips In town) Come on down and join us. If anyone wants to meet earlier for conversation and food please leave a comment in your response. The band is scheduled from 9 PM to 1 AM.
item.how_to_find_us: new place...we'll have to wing it

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Four on the Floor at Backstage Grill
